article_title: An Estes Park Fourth of July
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize An Estes Park Fourth of July

Dink Oversteg flys the flag, sort of, at the annual July 4th Pancake breakfast at Our Lady of the Mountains Catholic church. (Walt Hester) Enjoying the Fourth of July in Estes Park. (Rick Martinez)

Elkhorn Avenue is busy with July 4 visitors to Estes Park and Rocky Mountain National Park. (Rick Martinez)

Advertisement

Shoppers along Elkhorn Avenue during the July 4 holiday. (Rick Martinez)







Estes Park residents and guests are enjoying this year's Fourth of July.
